oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-01-04 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 4, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) and his Smoky Mountain Boys, guest performer Johnny Cash, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Howdy Forrester, June Webb, Jimmy Riddle, Minnie Pearl, and Bashful Brother Oswald. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 952nd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jimmy Riddle; Minnie Pearl; Johnny Cash; Bashful Brother Oswald; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys; Howdy Forrester
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Roy Acuff introduces Jimmy Riddle -- Dill Pickle Rag (Jimmy Riddle harmonica) -- Roy Acuff introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Roy Acuff introduces Johnny Cash -- Big River (Johnny Cash) -- Roy Acuff introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- Roll On Buddy, Roll On (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Roy Acuff talks -- Once More (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- Sally Gooden (Howdy Forrester fiddle) -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Forrester, Howdy, 1922-1987; Bashful Brother Oswald; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Webb, June, 1934-; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Cash, Johnny
